column4: anybody know why when I create an innodb mysql table, the resulting table is myisam?  do I need to install another package to get innodb table type support?
When you do CREATE TABLE there is an option to specify it.
right.  and I specify "innodb", but when I dump the DB the type is "myisam".
there's probably a better way to look at the table metadata than dumping the DB; I'll find it.
